name: Crash Course
lead_description: From courses like Astronomy to US History and Anatomy & Physiology it's got you covered with an awesome variety of AP high school curriculum topics. With various witty hosts at your service, you won't even notice you're getting smarter.

name: Khan academy
lead_description: Learn for free about math, art, computer programming, economics, physics, chemistry, biology, medicine, finance, history, and more.
